name: Mage Lords of Brams
description:
The city-fortress of Brams is renowned throughout the world as the home of the greatest wizards in existence: the Mage Lords. While inaccessible to most, the Mage Lords are now recruiting mages to join their ranks

Joining Brams is not just about prestige. Within the walls of the city-fortress you will gain access to the greatest arcane library in the world, countless experimental laboratories, equipment and reagents, and training from the most knowledgeable and powerful mages in existence, all of whom expand their knowledge and power so that they may one day ascend beyond the mortal realm.

Whether you are a seasoned archmage or sort of kind of a magic user on the side, all are welcomed to take the trials given to them by the remaining six Mage Lords, with those whose performance is found satisfactory being offered a seat among them.

Mage Lords of Brams is a "bullet heaven"/"reverse bullet hell" roguelite. Slaughter countless fantasy enemies with your powerful spells, powers and artifacts while gathering research scrolls to improve future runs inbetween levels.

Currently planned:
  • Over 12 standard races as well as additional secret races and monster/class combo characters, including fantasy staples like humans, orcs, vampires and way too many elves.
  • Choose from 40+ random armaments (spells, weapons, artifacts, and powers) + secret Ultimate Spells
  • Pick from 18 passive skills and improve over 100 passive abilities that transfer from game to game in the Library.
  • Cards of various qualities show up every level-up, adding an additional layer of complexity: the one you want might not offer the best attribute boost.
  • 6 main levels with unique layouts, environmental challenges and enemies, additional secret levels
